articles.author: Haroon Siddique
articles.title: Madeleine McCann's parents lose challenge over Portuguese libel case - The Guardian
articles.description: Couple sought redress from European court of human rights after libel case against detective was overturned
articles.content: The parents of Madeleine McCann have lost their European court of human rights challenge to the Portuguese supreme courts decision to throw out their libel case against a former detective who implica… [+1984 chars]

articles.title: Hungary government submits first anti-graft bill to avoid losing EU funds - Reuters
articles.description: Hungary's government has submitted the first of several anti-corruption bills to parliament on Monday as Budapest scrambles to avoid losing billions of euros in European Union funding.
articles.content: BUDAPEST, Sept 19 (Reuters) - Hungary's government has submitted the first of several anti-corruption bills to parliament on Monday as Budapest scrambles to avoid losing billions of euros in European… [+3417 chars]

articles.author: Naomi O’Leary
articles.title: Irish judge elected first female President of the European Court of Human Rights - The Irish Times
articles.description: Dubliner Síofra O’Leary will take up the three-year role in November
articles.content:
Irish judge Síofra OLeary has been elected President of the European Court of Human Rights, the first woman to hold the position.
The Dubliner, who has been vice-president of the court since January… [+2680 chars]
